title: Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring Product Engineers
author: kanjun
excerpt: Imbue (F.K.A. Generally Intelligent) is an AI research company working directly on building human-level general machine intelligence that can learn naturally in the way humans do. Our mission is to understand the fundamentals of learning and build safe, humane machine intelligence. Here are our open roles:

html:
Imbue (F.K.A. Generally Intelligent) is an AI research company working directly on building human-level general machine intelligence that can learn naturally in the way humans do. Our mission is to understand the fundamentals of learning and build safe, humane machine intelligence. Here are our open roles:

Founding Product Engineer (SF, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/imbue/0764f1c0-89e5-452f-ab41-ff1d1ba8...

Research Scientist (SF, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/imbue/6c25a25c-35ec-4d7b-8d7e-40e9c4c8...

Software Engineer, Infrastructure (SF or Remote, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/imbue/e66a55a3-a117-406c-9b07-8ba05504...

Software Engineer, Machine Learning (SF or Remote, Full-time): https://jobs.lever.co/imbue/9411e2ec-502a-403f-a39a-0d44c676...
